alert.note: Alert for Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 6:59PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Nassau and east central Charlton Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 658 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near St. George, or 11 miles southwest of Hilliard, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hilliard. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
